scripts.build: echo 'No build step required for Node.js'
scripts.db:setup: npm run migrate:all && npm run seed && node src/seeders/simpleMultiEventSeeder.js
scripts.db:setup:quick: node src/migrations/run-all-migrations.js && node src/seeders/index.js && node src/seeders/simpleMultiEventSeeder.js
scripts.db:destroy: node -e "import('pg').then(async ({default: pg}) => { const connString = (await import('fs')).default.readFileSync('.env', 'utf8').match(/NEON_DATABASE_URL=(.+)/)[1]; const client = new pg.Client(connString); await client.connect(); await client.query('DROP SCHEMA public CASCADE'); await client.query('CREATE SCHEMA public'); await client.query('GRANT ALL ON SCHEMA public TO PUBLIC'); console.log('âœ… Database destroyed and reset'); await client.end(); })"
